pullRequest.title: disallow VARCHAR_IGNORECASE in PostgreSQL mode
pullRequest.bodyText:
change all VARCHAR_IGNORECASE columns in pg_catalog to VARCHAR
user and role return lower case
fixes #2686

nodes.bodyText: There is Database.sysIdentifier() for this purpose.
